price: A dopušteno nije da se stanovnici bilo kojeg naselja koje smo Mi uništili vrate!
arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waḥarāmun ʿalā qaryatin ahlaknāhā annahum lā yarjiʿūna
